ast.name: missile defense
ast.comment: A full featured game where you defend cities against incoming missiles.

body.text: Play given wave of missile defense. Wave defines number of simultaneous missile attacks and length of wave.
Draws a landscape using random up and down movements. Returns a map that gives the height of the land at each y position.
Increase size of sprite until a given maximum. Return true if the maximum is reached
Creates a picture of a city scape based on some random height blocks
Initialize sprites that display the score and high score on the board and position them properly
Increase the current score by the number of points and redisplay it on the board
Check if high-score was beaten and update it. Animate a rotating text saying either game over or new high.
Play the missile defense game starting with wave 1. Touch screen where you want your defensive missile to explode.
Find closest city to given coordinate.
Return the distance squared from the sprite to the given coordinate
